description: An HTML file for a database viewer intended for browsing tables and data from connected databases.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and loads a list of databases from the server. Displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the current selection.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the display of table lists for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and loads a list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table in the database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the loaded data into a visible table format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell data, handling null, object, and string values appropriately.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses the content of a table cell when clicked to show more details.
